Title: Relates to redefining the term crosswalk to include an unmarked portion of the roadway
Summary: Redefines the term "crosswalk" to include an unmarked portion of the roadway between opposite sides of the street or highway where there is no marked crosswalk.
LawCode: Amd ยง110, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to redefining the term "crosswalk" to include an unmarked portion of the roadway
